import React from 'react' import { Checkbox, Grid, Header, Icon, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar, } from 'semantic-ui-react' function Example () { const [visible, setVisible] = React.useState(false) return (
visible }} onChange={(e, data) => setVisible(data.checked)} /> setVisible(false)} vertical visible={visible} width='thin' > Home Games Channels File Permissions Share on Social Share by E-mail Edit Permissions Delete Permanently
Application Content
) } export default Example
